scikits.statsmodels.robust.scale.mad¶

scikits.statsmodels.robust.scale.mad(a, c=0.67448975019608171, axis=0)¶

The Median Absolute Deviation along given axis of an array

Parameters:

a : array-like

Input array.

c : float, optional

The normalization constant. Defined as scipy.stats.norm.ppf(3/4.), which is approximately .6745.

axis : int, optional

The defaul is 0.
Returns:

mad : float

mad = median(abs(a))/c
